greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Greatest prime number p(n) with decimal fraction period of length n.
link: Ray Chandler, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..322
Index entries for sequences related to decimal expansion of 1/n
mathematica: a[n_] := Cyclotomic[n, 10] // FactorInteger // Last // First; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 26}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 05 2013, after Pari *)
results.author: Heiner Muller-Merbach (hmm(AT)sozwi.uni-kl.de), May 29 2001
